website_summaries.verdict: The XA Pro 3D GTX is a popular Salomon trail shoe for those who want a comfortable gear that would protect and secure their feet. It has moderate arch support and pronation control mechanics for those who want to have additional underfoot cradling.
pros: The GORE-TEX upper membrane offers a comfortable foot wrap that’s also waterproof
The added features in the upper help the runner to be as efficient as possible when taking on adventures
Runners welcomed the inclusion of anti-debris mechanics, which enhances the XA Pro 3D GTX’s protective capabilities
The mid-sole was crafted to provide underfoot comfort that’s reliable and consistent
The stability and motion control mechanics in the shoe maintain balance and right positioning of the foot
Runners liked the anti-abrasion capability of the outsole unit, making it ideal for tackling harsh surfaces
cons: The XA Pro 3D GTX is a very expensive running shoe
The men’s version is much heavier than the women’s version and many testers have observed this
There were reviewers who criticized this shoe for being too narrow

customer_reviews.title: They are not waterproof for very long!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second pair of Salomon trail running WATERPROOF shoes. My first pair sadly started taking in water when they weren't quite a year old. I did like them a lot and decided to buy another pair in October 18. I am having to report that sadly, the latest pair, though only being 7 months old, are taking in water!! and it is both the left and the right! walking the dog with wet feet is not fun! I'm really disappointed as the shoe is a really good fit and looks good too. I think I will have to consider buying another brand. Any ideas would be very welcome. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Zizzi

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had these a month now and put a few hundred miles on them. They were comfy straight out the box and no issues with blisters or hot spots. After a few longer walks my feet were a bit achy so I have upgraded the insoles (Sorbothane Double Strike) and that's made a massive difference – both to my feet and my knees. First time I've bought this model after 2 pairs of XA Pro 3Ds - last pair the sole came away from the upper after about 700 miles, which is fair enough for a shoe like this. Just lurrrrve the speedy laces and wouldn't go back to normal laces now. Ace!
customer_reviews.author: Mr A Watt

customer_reviews.title: Like the quick-fasteners
customer_reviews.text: Really good trail shoes. Good for running and also walking over rough ground. The quick-fastening feature (instead of normal laces) was a little strange at first but once I got used to it I realise that it's way better than normal laces. Much quicker to get on and off, plus easier to adjust to be just right. It's not obvious, but there's a little pocket for the tie-adjuster mechanism - if you don't use it then the ties flap about a bit. It's only after a week of use that I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr P Morley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! So glad I decided to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.text: I use to work in Blacks the outdoor group and Salomon were and has always been my preferred choice for shoes/boots. Best in quality and the only company that fit my fit perfectly. I owned 2 pairs of 3D pro XDs which I wore everyday in winter/autumn months. Until I accidentally misplaced them and ever since been wanting to get another pair. Not until I broke my middle toe I decided to get a pair again. WHY didn't I get a another pair sooner!?! I don't use them as intended (cross fell running) but I do use them for my winter/autumn shoes. No other shoe compares ha!
customer_reviews.author: MR RM ARNOLD

customer_reviews.title: good product, good fit, good delivery
customer_reviews.text: Shoes as described, delivered in original box. Added about half a size to Salomon's recommended size as per other reviews recommending this and this worked fine for me. They are comfortable, a bit hot in summer maybe and might be a bit hard to insert the rear of your feet the first time you put them on (probably to provide a good support for the ankle). The water protection seems to work well, walked in wet grass for a few minutes several times and feet kept totally dry.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: As always check Salomon numbers
customer_reviews.text: It's the second time I bought this pair as I have them already in black colour. I normally wear 44 (29 cm) but Salomon has smaller numbers so ensure that you check their numbers in centimeters in order to buy the correct one. I always buy 45.3 Salomon number to fit them as expected. As far as it concern the shoes, they are maybe the best pair of trekking shoes I've worn in my life! I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Fotios

customer_reviews.title: Quality waterproof trail shoes.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, these deliver. I’ve gone up a size to get a good fit, normally and 11, so I got 12’s. Speed lace system makes for quick, easy and comfortable wearing. These are the waterproof ones, that have been well tested trail walking and mountain biking, with dry feet.
customer_reviews.author: wayne davies

customer_reviews.title: First pair of this particular model and very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I wear a UK 12 in brands such as Caterpillar and Clarks, and have owned many Salomons, which I wear in 13.5 UK to give others an indication as to the fit difference. Nothing more to say than I buy them for their quality and durability. First pair of this particular model and very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: William Gofar

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair and they are still as good as ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes or versions of them for the past 5 years and wear them every day, my feet are always warm when they need to be and cool in the summer. I had been through 3 pairs and I still love them yes they are a lot but like most things you get what you pay for. Beware of the sellers only go with trusted or Amazon directly I bought my second pair and they were fakes, I sent them back for a refund and bought from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking trail shoe and special sale price a no brainer
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box, I was immediately impressed by the shoes, my size 10 fitted perfectly, with the dog in tow I went off to road test them and they did not let me down if I was picky the surplus self-tightening lace which tucks behind the shoe tongue can become free and go underfoot which in turn could cause damage to the lacing system.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Trail Shoe you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of this shoe design - the Salomon XA Pro 3D GTX. The shoe is very comfortable from the outset and has a wide fitting. The Gortex keeps you dry and the sole is long lasting and has very good grip on all surfaces. Always buy a half size larger than the shoe size you would normally buy to ensure a comfotable fit under all conditions. Yes, they are expensive but you get what you pay for - a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: GJP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control! Lace on on one came snapped!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality control. The laces came snapped out of the box on this brand new pair(see attached pictures.) For an erstwhile reliable brand such as Salomon it's a bit of a shame that they have apparently given up quality control along with moving production to Vietnam. And this is what I found out of the box on a brand new pair, makes me extremely suspicious of the longevity claims.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Very Good in Normal Conditions
customer_reviews.text: These are a very comfortable hiking shoe and great for normal walks and less technical treks. Personally I will not use them for any hill walking or technical treks, I just don't feel like they are stable enough or provide that much support. I have other trekking / trail running shoes which I feel much more stable in. They are however great looking, very comfortable and ideal for long walks / runs in normal conditions. I went a half size up as others have recommended and they are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: michael morrison

customer_reviews.title: NOT a running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a walking shoe only. How people run in them is beyond me. Have a pair of Bondcliff Salomons and they are really comfortable. These are sold incorrectly as a running shoe but the lack of cushioning makes them very uncomfortable. I've had Salomon Quest 3dGTX boots in the past and were a great boot. It would appear that either I was unlucky with this pair or attention to detail has taken a nose dive at Salomon. Nowhere near as comfortable as I was expecting from past experience and definitely not worth spending that amount of money on them. I can't stress this enough. Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.author: Mart

customer_reviews.title: blisters and cut ankles
customer_reviews.text: Whilst these seem a well built pair of trainers they are not for me. I have worn Salomon shoes before and not had any issues but these caused blisters and cut into my heel which caused discomfort and bleeding. I have worn them for approx. 38km of running and they haven't gotten any better.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, reasonably water resistant (not waterproof)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for disc golf, used for four months. They are holding up well and provide some resistance against morning dew. I like the quick lace mechanism, although many do not. Some seams are starting to show signs of the glue coming off, so looks like durability could be better. On the other hand, this seems to be the usual performance in this price category.
customer_reviews.author: Aristoteles

customer_reviews.title: A good trail running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: A nice trail running shoe. The fit was OK for my size 9 medium feet but it did feel a little tight when I first put them on - However I have now done three 8km runs in them with varying thickness socks and had now issues. The grip is good but (thankfully) I have not had to test the water resistance yet - lol
customer_reviews.author: Mr R M Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I find these shoes comfortable but water resistance is limited, the first real use of mine was an all day tramp around Ullswater in the lake district in the UK. It rained all day - of course - after an hour of walking my feet were soggy which wasn't great. Other than this as a gripe I'm quite happy with them. Especially like the drawstring laces for easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: mcmonap

customer_reviews.title: One very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for a week and have gone on several walks and worn them around the house generally. I have found the shoes extremely comfortable and am further considering replacing my hiking boots for the equivalent Salomon 4D boot such is my satisfaction. I easily recommend these shoes for anyone who is looking for a comfortable daily / weekend shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Syms

customer_reviews.title: Durability issues
customer_reviews.text: I've worn X Ultras for several years and being a bit frustrated with the newer generations durability decided to try a less expensive model with the idea I could replace them more often. The Xa Pros are very comfortable out of the box, but the stock insoles are absolutely rubbish after any distance. They are quite thin and begin to bunch if there is any moisture in the shoe. Remedied with fitted insoles I had on hand, but then again the sole started separating after about 50 miles. They just don't hold up to use, let alone abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, good fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits well. I bought 1 size bigger than for normal shoes (I bought size 11, my normal shoe fit is size 10). It has been comfortable from the off, no blisters or other discomfort despite walking for 2 hours on first day of wearing. I have given it a 4 rating as I do not know the longevity of the shoe. If the lace system breaks, it looks difficult to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for AT supervisors
customer_reviews.text: I use these for DofE checkpointing and generally supervising cadets on adventure training. I can knock about on wet camping fields with dry feet. Easy to slip on and secure so no faffing with my own kit when I should be supervising the kids. I found them too hot to run in but for my needs...perfect.
customer_reviews.author: andrew watson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I buy Salomon because the fit is consistent across the range. So there is minimal risk when buying from the internet. I took these shoes on a 10 day vacation - the only pair of shoes I took and the only pair I needed. I've stepped in puddles where the water comes over the whole upper - no leaks. With the non-Gortex models, you can feel the wind blowing through the uppers. These GTX models can be worn in very cold weather and you don't get cold feet even though they are not specifically insulated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shoe, sturdy & fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I love these, it’s my 3rd pair in 5 years. I only have use of 1 hand, so the fastening system is perfect They fit like a glove. I’ve had blue before, but I think they look great in black
customer_reviews.author: Pedro troll boy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking and running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Salomon trail running shoes because I was looking for a a pair of lightweight wide fitting shoes for walking in the Pennines. The pair I ordered was half a size larger than my foot size to allow room for thick socks. I found them to be not only very comfortable and light but to provide all the room requires for my feet, whilst providing very good foot arch support and protection from discomfort on rough stony surfaces. In my opinion the Salomon trail running shoes were an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Denyer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t worry about the laces !
customer_reviews.text: I deliberated long & hard over these...wanted them for everyday use & dog walking...I really wasn’t sure about the lacing system..if it breaks, you’re stuffed... I took the plunge & glad I did...bloody hell, they are really comfortable. Lacing all good so far after everyday use since I bought them. Recommended !
customer_reviews.author: DIE-HARD

customer_reviews.title: I  like them
customer_reviews.text: Unlike all my other Salomon shoes/boots these are going to take a little time to break in, all my others have been really comfortable right out of the box but these feel a little "firm" they should supple up though, all in all I am happy with them. I think they will need to be fitted with some small gaiters though to stop small debris from getting inside them on gravely tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Bazzr14

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Salomon shoes. Sizing is perfect. I fit shoes for a living, unfortunately, and the size is correct, meaning the same as other brands I wear. These are authentic Salomon shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Genuine OK Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of these shoes, and they are as good as ever. I like the waterproofing, and the fit. Comfortable from the very start. I went mine every day and do a lot of walking 5-10 miles a day. They last 15-18 months before they start squeaking or start to lose waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: Peter F. Buckland

customer_reviews.title: King Salomon..
customer_reviews.text: Fed up with continuously buying cheaper walking shoes, but decided to invest in a pair of Salomon shoes... and boy! I am not disappointed. They are by far the best walking shoes that I’ve ever bought. As I live on the cambrian mountains / snowdonia area and walk plenty... perfect for the Moelwynion..
customer_reviews.author: Cymro

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely rip off...second grade... avoid at all cost
customer_reviews.text: They are not the same as they used to be. The code doesnt match with genuine salomons. Mine broke after 2 days of walking only!!! No off road or trails... They are second grade or fake. Not what it used to be... Ps: i own 6 other pairs and every 1 or 2 i got new set of xa pro 3d gtx....this is by far the worsest quality. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up I am a UK 10 but ordered a UK 10.5
customer_reviews.text: These are the second pair of salomon xa pro 3d trainers I have owned, actually wore the last pair out over a years hard graft in them wearing them every day for a year. You WILL NOT find a more comfortable, light weight, hard wearing pair of trainers. Well done salomon I am a customer for life
customer_reviews.author: The man in black

customer_reviews.title: Love these Footwear
customer_reviews.text: Not a runner anymore, unfortunately, but bought primarily for all terrain walking. Love them so far. Very comfortable, and so far have not lost grip. Fastening mechanism great and easily operated. Hopefully they will continue to manufacture for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Andy.H

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had several pairs of these over the years and the quality seems to have dropped off. 5 months old and something in the sole has failed, making an annoyingly loud click with every step.
customer_reviews.author: keith watson Puk Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Random sizing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 9 as I'm a 9 it was far too large (about a 10.5/11), ordered a size 8 & can just about fit my foot into it, very narrow towards the toes. According to the size chart I should be a UK size 11.5 .
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: I gine though must be 10 pairs theses over a very long time
customer_reviews.text: I been using this brand and model of trail show now for years it is my favourite one for trail running. Lasts around 6 months running almost every days 10km each time. mix of road off road mum rock running. Also use them for summer hiking. Out the trail shoes i tried these my favourite.
customer_reviews.author: 4seasonbackpacking

customer_reviews.title: A excellent, supportive shoe for rough ground.
customer_reviews.text: A solid shoe, with good support across the foot and good grip up and down slopes. Roomy toe box so good wriggle room. A bit hard underfoot but they are still new , so may well adjust or I can use a different insole. Lacing system a bit wayward at times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my favourite winter Nordic walking waterproof shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always prompt speedy delivery from the company. These are my favourite winter Nordic walking waterproof shoes. Comfy, water tight and perfect. I do wear these daily and therefore do not last as long as more robust leather boots but the comfort is incomparable and worth the slightly shorter lifespan. Well worn with love!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Not waterproof/resistant
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in these, brilliant fit and very comfortable but they don’t keep the water out at all, I walked through a field in the morning which was covered in morning dew, before I even got to the end my feet were absolutely soaking, I bought these specifically for this walk and now I don’t even wear them.
customer_reviews.author: rory

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe had a lump on the insole and had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: alays buy 1 size larger
customer_reviews.text: as a nordic walking instructor you need comfort and dry feet all day long, have worn Salomons for years now and always will, a shoe yo can trust
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B. Bibi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these all the time, for millitary phys and every day use. Comfortable and hard wearing. We always buy salomons.
customer_reviews.author: WhiskyCholo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Salomon shoes have an awesome quality, fit well and are comfortable. Durability excellent! Nothing to complain!
customer_reviews.author: alraune666

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect but only if you know what  size to get
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used these trainers for a long time the only thing is he has to go up a size, he is a size 9 in footwear but a 10 in them otherwise they are great trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Jean R.

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable warm and keep your feet dry
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I’ve owned and wore the last ones daily for almost 3years. They are comfortable warm and keep your feet dry. It’s worth mentioning that I ordered a size up as they do come up small otherwise. Order some today , you shouldn’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mr H

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love salomon gear but need to remember my fat wide feet never fit them too well, real shame for H width fellas :(
customer_reviews.author: Crags

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of walking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and on time. Fits as expected as I previously owned another pair of Saloman shoes which these replaced. Bit stiff to walk in initially until broken in a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built shoe. But not always dry
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. Perfect for running and hiking but sadly after just a few uses they leak so not ideal in wet weather, wet grass etc. Pity because they are comfortable but this is the third pair I have that leak after a while. Not sure I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking shoe. Broke them in on a 16 mile walk and they were comfy from start to finish. I bought half a size bigger than my normal size which was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right from the very first wear, sturdy, great product
customer_reviews.author: Rasputin

customer_reviews.title: The Shoe itself is OK - not as impressive at ...
customer_reviews.text: The Shoe itself is OK - not as impressive at the photo. Its impressively light - but why design something and size it so ridiculously small - size 10 and you need at least an 11 or 11 1/2!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ward

customer_reviews.title: small size for me
customer_reviews.text: very happy with them , i have broad feet and usualy take 9.5-10 uk but need 10.5 Solomon other than that they are great
customer_reviews.author: philip higginson

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size up
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for walking trails. I'm on my third pair and they usually last just over a year at 10Km a day average before the soles wear though. Comfortable from new but order a half size up as the toe box can be tight if you have normal/wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Spannaa

customer_reviews.title: Still ok.
customer_reviews.text: Always get half size bigger in Salomon. Quality has dropped over last few years used to be 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great all round shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great all terrain shoe. My go to shoes for everyday, and had several pairs over several years. Very comfortable, and light, great for long walks and they last very well. The GorTex waterproofing always been great, only got wet feet once in torrential rain where it probably came down my legs anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as I've been wearing this type of shoe for the last 10 years and cannot fault it.
customer_reviews.author: nephew95

customer_reviews.title: Nice - but not for wide feet !
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality - but beware, not for wide feet !
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: I've had many pairs of these before and have always ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had many pairs of these before and have always been a UK size 10, these ones are a little on the small side but as I'd already worn them outside too late to return them
customer_reviews.author: James Le Bic

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! This is probably my eighth pair over the years, really comfortable and great support. Gore Tex has limited life span though through wear and tear. Great support though.
customer_reviews.author: Jezp

customer_reviews.title: First trail shoes a success.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered earlier than promised - always a bonus! The fit was as expected. I had done my homework and selected a half size larger the normal shoes (same as my road running shoes). First run was on slippery tarmac,no problems they felt very secure and on the grass section they were stable and kept my feet dry. No PB on the day but that was my poor performance not the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: MR Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are small by euro standards
customer_reviews.text: orderred correct european size but too small and tight order bigger size
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking footwear at an excellent price. Ordered a half size more than usual as advised by other reviews doing this makes the shoe more comfortable "No toe rubbing".
customer_reviews.author: Martin U

customer_reviews.title: Buy a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Reading the review I decided to buy a larger size & was glad I did. Would recommend doing likewise but the quality is superb👍
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers 💙
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them a size up from my usual size and they fitted perfectly. Took a week of daily short walk to break them in ,very comfy and the waterproofing works as well.
customer_reviews.author: michael twomey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I Love these shoes, these are my second pair. My fist pair is still going strong after 3 years. I fancied a change in colour so bought these.
customer_reviews.author: glen williams

customer_reviews.title: All the trainer you need !!
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality shoe , comfortable and very durable for me the best shoe on the market and built to last !
customer_reviews.author: mr robert mckay

customer_reviews.title: I've bought 5 pairs because they are great.
customer_reviews.text: They will always erode behind the heel it's a weak point, and the foot sole disintegrates faster than ice cream in direct sun. I've bought 5 pairs because they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary wilders

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with sizing
customer_reviews.text: Had many pairs of these shoes and sizing is a problem. 44 at first were right then too small so 44.5 purchased and fitted. New pair ordered as 44.5 but now too big - no idea why
customer_reviews.author: MR MR MILNER

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lightweight and almost breathable walking shoes - great support and stability
customer_reviews.author: Michael Browne

customer_reviews.title: Fitting
customer_reviews.text: I got what i ordered,and delivered fast.I like salomon shoes,before i started using the salomon brand,i had wasted my money with other expensive brands only to last for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, this is my second pair after a few years of use, no issues and feel just as good as they last set I owned. Give it a few days/ weeks to soften the back heal, but once done you will use them everyday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trendy flashy loud and proud.
customer_reviews.text: Stunning and well made everyone asks where I bought them, embarrassing really as I'm a 53 year old fat lad.I just love shoes these are one of the best purchases by far.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence young

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd pair of salomons, so comfortable, I honestly would not purchase another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rob Warner

customer_reviews.title: Super comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size larger than I normally take after reading reviews. They fit and are really very comfortable. Probably the best walking shoes I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bridgewater

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than other Salomon shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 pairs of Salomon and all of them are size 9, perfect fit. This one are different to accurate and first try it feels like everything is ok but after wearing them for all day it makes my feet sore. So make sure you are taking at least a half a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G.

customer_reviews.title: They are okay.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected. I've had Solomon outdoor sports shoes in the past and always been really pleased with them. But I'm a little disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not the prettiest shoes in the world, but I've never tried anything so comfortable. I've had them for 6 months and they are still waterproof. I use them for hiking and long walks mostly. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Vtsd

customer_reviews.title: Big toe issues!!
customer_reviews.text: One month in and my right toe constantly hurts whilst the left shoe is perfect. Disappointed. Sizing is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Niall Dargan

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so rigid, they don’t give at all even after wearing them in. they gave me such bad blisters that I’ll never wear them again, so I’m trying to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Camfield

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof lightweight walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect, shoe is comfortable to wear but needs a little breaking in, I think the waterproofing makes it stiffer when new.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Atam

customer_reviews.title: My partner said they are very comfortable and is very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: My partner said they are very comfortable and is very pleased with them. He will definitely be buying more of this make.
customer_reviews.author: Miss A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but need .5 size bigger then normal...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking and comfortable to walk in.. As a lot of others I had to order 10.5 as the size 10 were a little tight.. easy and hassle free return tho..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this few years ago. So I decided to buy the same Salomon shoes. No regreats! Very confortable and good for running in any condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but smaller than other makes
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but had to exchange my ones for bigger size as too small. The larger size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my father in law and he just loves them
customer_reviews.author: Cathrine Clack

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes, remember they are meant to breathe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes, remember they are meant to breathe, therefor they don't keep your feet very warm on chilly days outside.. I love em, next pair i'll order a full size bigger rather than a half size, bit tight in the toe box
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: A good product, that seems to last well. I would buy a 1/2 size larger for my next pair, they are a little tight with decent walking socks.
customer_reviews.author: aWalkOnTheMildSide

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my husband who walks a lot, he loves them very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Madmum

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof trainer
customer_reviews.text: Slightly small due to having a larger right foot than left normally requiring 13’s but only 12.5 or 13.5 available. Product itself is great, comfortable and good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fit
customer_reviews.text: All good fantastic, nice and light fit well, no messing with laces.
customer_reviews.author: John (jtb)

customer_reviews.title: Shoe come up small
customer_reviews.text: I has always been size 7 I thought by wearing a few times the fit would improve , but the shoe fit pushes the foot forward. A size bigger is needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size bigger that you usually are
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are amazing can’t fault them. Only thing was I’m size 9 usually so I had to send back the first pair they sent me and re order half a size up 9.5 they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruan

customer_reviews.title: Fall to pieces after few months wear
customer_reviews.text: Had less than 12 months, shocked today to find tops coming away from base..... Not salomon normal quality, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: After owning a pair for a couple of years, I had to get another - 5* quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: All the trail shoe you need
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about these bad boys - comfy, easy quick lace system, waterproof and grippy in all but the sloppiest of conditions! My third pair now and I wouldn’t go for anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Lee P.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have them one month and I am very happy. Comfortable, great support and keep my feet dry. Though I haven’t really tested them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair, fit is great with walking sock and they do half sizes as well.
customer_reviews.author: nb robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good tread. Very easy to tighten up
customer_reviews.text: Sexy looking shoe. Good tread. Very easy to tighten up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased
customer_reviews.text: I generally have trouble with fitting shoes, however these were a half size larger than usual but perfect and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Good, but other model may be better
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, but preferred the Salomon X Ultra 3 GTX
customer_reviews.author: Loch Miwa

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Xa Pro 3D GTX Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The weather will never be against you if you have the right equipment. Get out and face the elements. Dare to defy the elements with the XA PRO 3D GTX, the emblematic shoes that will accompany you in your adventures on all terrains, regardless of the conditions. Thanks to the lightweight, waterproof Gore-Tex membrane, you can easily handle the most difficult terrains. Lightness: The lightweight shoe (335 to 385 g) ensures easy comfort even during long workouts. Waterproof: Waterproof Gore-Tex lining to keep your feet dry at all times. Quick and Safe Lace Adjustment: The Quicklace system allows you to tighten the laces quickly and easily, without knots. Fit Management: The Sensifit system cradles the foot ideally, offering a secure and snug fit. Sole: The Contagrip Wet Traction sole is made from light, resistant rubber that offers grip and resistance to ensure a safe run on wet surfaces. Stability: Increased lateral stability thanks to the enhanced 3D design.
feature_bullets: Men's trail running shoe for long distance off-road runs in the mountains or forest
Perfect fit, Easy to slip on and off foot thanks to Quicklace lacing system, Water-resistant upper material for dry feet, No pebbles in shoes due to mesh insert and tight closure underneath ankle
Extremely light running shoe with removable OrthoLite insole made of EVA foam for cool and dry feet, Comfortable to wear, Good cushioning and anatomical foot support with EVA foam midsole
Content: 1 Pair of Salomon XA Pro 3D GTX Trail Running Shoes, Material: Synthetic/Textile, Colour: Black (Black/Black/Magnet), Size: 42 2/3
No slipping on wet, slippery or muddy mountain or forest terrain due to Premium Wet Contagrip technology: Low profile for a good performance even on uneven ground. Compressed EVA Midsole
